channel.title: js on Music's blog
channel.description: Recent content in js on Music's blog

item.title: deepClone
item.description: 深拷贝 function deepCopy(data) { const t = this.typeOf(data); let o; if (t === 'array') { o = []; } else if (t === 'object') { o = {}; } else { return data; } if (t === 'array') { for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { o.push(this.deepCopy(data[i])); } } else if (t === 'object') { for (let i in data) { o[i] = this.deepCopy(data[i]); }
